attributes.review: this app was not helpful at all!!!! when i opened it up a cheeto was just staring at me and scared me and my dog. i had to take him to the vet because he was getting constant nightmares. please do not use this app especially in front of animals!!! it scars them for LIFE!!!
attributes.title: awful app

attributes.review:
My grandmother always told me, “when people are being ugly you must walk away from them”.
I can’t leave my country. All I can do is spread awareness and hope that the voters can open their eyes and see how ugly this man truly is.
attributes.title: This man is a villain

attributes.review: Crash bait 😔?????????  Wanted to check out the platform but started to experience major problems once I downloaded my phone kept glitching and rebooting as if it could not handle the application
attributes.title: Another alternative?

attributes.review: This game is so scary. I’m still having nightmares. I have nightmares of a big orange oompa loompa that stands and a 45° angle and has corn leaves for hair 😭 in my nightmare he can’t properly drink water and says really questionable stuff like grab em by the 🐱. I have never felt so scared in my life till I downloaded this game. DO NOT DOWNLOAD OR YOULL GET NIGHTMARES
attributes.title: Scary game

attributes.review: If I could give it zero stars I would. I’m currently on the phone with my bank trying to understand how my information was leaked. This is unbelievable and only made my life so much harder.
attributes.title: I got scammed once i downloaded this app

attributes.review: i’m very disappointed in this app. when i downloaded it, as soon as i opened it 🤡donald’s🤢🤮nudes popped up on the screen! i was shocked and terrified and immediately after that i looked up at my wall and the words “trump 2020” were being etched into my wall in an 🍊orange🍊color. i was confused and terrified at what was happening so i grabbed my pet rat🐀 and left asap. i then deleted the app and things were back to normal. don’t download this app unless you want to see the antichrist.
attributes.title: ✨booty crust✨

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted to get updates on president Trump’s campaign for 2020 but unfortunately the app was very hard to use and then it made other apps and eventually my phone crash. Not worth it really.
attributes.title: Don’t get this app

attributes.review: The app was glitching. When it finished downloading it kept kicking me out of the app and made my phone shut off several times! It gave my brain a virus. If this app doesn’t get deleted I will be making phone call😠😠😠😠😠😠😠😠✨✨✨✨
attributes.title: unhappy 😠😠

attributes.review: as a person who has had tiktok since 2015 when it was still musically i am greatly upset about it getting deleted! how am i gonna learn new dances or what am i going to do for hours a day because i’m usually on there for 5 or more hours! it’s my safe place when i get in trouble. it’s how i fall asleep at night! and it’s how i learn stuff about the world since we aren’t in school! tiktok has become apart of my daily routine. idk what i’m gonna do without it
attributes.title: save tiktok

attributes.review: It kept crashing and used so much storage. It is not a well thought out app. It is not interesting to look at and it’s boring. I think the information should be clearer. It’s just not good in general. I wish it was but sad to say it’s not.
attributes.title: It sucked
